sentences.sContent: The green eyes in the carefully sweet face were turbulent, willful, lusty with life, distinctly at variance with her decorous demeanor .
sentences.sContent_eng: The green eyes in the carefully sweet face were turbulent, willful, lusty with life, distinctly at variance with her decorous demeanor .
sentences.sCn: 那双绿色的眼睛生在一张甜美的脸上，却仍然是任性的，充满活力的，与她的装束仪表很不相同。

phrases.pCn: 故意的不良行为 条约法律；渎职

words.tran: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的
意志；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
乐意；心甘情愿；自动自发
决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

trans.tranCn: 成心的， 有意的； 任性的
